description:
A new costume for Levi is added.

▼How to use
You can access the new costume by performing either of the following:
・Select "Another Mode" on the main menu, and then select Levi. Change into the costume "Plain Clothes (Underground City)" by pressing the A Button when you are near the tent on the field.
・Select "Story Mode" on the main menu, and then approach Levi in the Daily Life section, or approach him at the regimental base in "Territory Recovery Mode". Change into the costume "Plain Clothes (Underground City)" by pressing the B Button when you are near Levi.
name: Additional costume for Levi "Plain Clothes (Underground City)" Costume
